QuestData.Title: Pyrophobia
QuestData.Description: W- we have done n-n-nothing to provoke the arakkoa... w-why would they attack Aruuna? What do they want from us?$B$BI want to run, but I'm... too afraid. That leader of theirs will burn me to a crisp, I just know it!$B$BH-he's just inside the inn...
QuestData.RewardText: You killed him? Oh, oh thank you!$B$BBut what was that he said about an artifact?
